name: Today has driven home how nuanced life really is. No matter how black and white an issue may appear to you, its always more complex than it may seem. Extremism is dangerous.

content.html: Today has driven home how nuanced life really is. No matter how black and white an issue may appear to you, its always more complex than it may seem. Extremism is dangerous.
